title: Cody Simpson pens sexy poem about Miley Cyrus as romance heats up
text:
Australian singer Cody Simpson appears to be falling fast for Miley Cyrus.

After the pair went public with their romance last week, the 22-year-old took to Instagram to share a gushing poem on Monday.

Under the alias Prince Neptune, Cody wrote about 'spinning Elvis records and making love' in the early stages of a relationship.

He's falling fast! Cody Simpson has written a sexually-charged poem inspired by his new relationship with Miley Cyrus (pictured together)

Cody's complete poem read: 'The moon's souvenir, the boulevardier, a ballerina on the promenade.

'We open our curtains to the domesticated world for a natural hour, spinning Elvis records and making love in the soft jewelled morning.'

Cody first started sharing his musings as Prince Neptune in 2016, and will shortly be releasing his own book of poetry.

In 2018, he officially revealed himself as the creative mind behind the anonymous Instagram account, tweeting: 'I am Prince Neptune, poet.'

'In the soft jewelled morning': Under the alias Prince Neptune, Cody wrote about 'spinning Elvis records and making love' in the early stages of a relationship

Hidden talent: Cody first started sharing his musings as Prince Neptune in 2016, and he will shortly be releasing his own book of poetry

Meanwhile, Cody's latest poem was widely praised by fans, with many interpreting it as a dedication to his new girlfriend.

'Dedicated to queen Miley,' one follower wrote, while another added: 'Miley inspiring some pretty good stuff! Love this couple.'

A third fan commented: 'Miley putting in your feels?'

'Miley inspiring some pretty good stuff!' Cody's latest poem was widely praised by fans, with many interpreting it as a dedication to his new girlfriend

New couple: Miley and Cody, who have been friends for several years, went public with their romance last week after they were spotted on a date in LA. Pictured in 2015

Things appear to be going well for Miley and Cody, with the heartthrob taking to Instagram on Sunday to serenade his new love.

Cody, who has had a crush on the former Disney star since he was 12, shared a video of himself cuddling up to Miley and singing to her as they watched a movie in bed.

He sung More Today Than Yesterday, which was made famous by American pop band Spiral Starecase in 1969.

'More than yesterday': Things appear to be going well for Miley and Cody, with the heartthrob taking to Instagram on Sunday to serenade his new love

Miley, 26, recently called off her brief relationship with Kaitlynn Carter, following the breakdown of her marriage to Liam Hemsworth, earlier this year.

Last week, she blasted trolls on social media who were 'sl*t shaming' her for moving on with Cody so soon after her split with Kaitlynn.

'I refuse to [be a] recluse and "date" from home because a) that's not fun, b) [It's] extremely uncomfortable/puts me in a vulnerable position,' she wrote on Instagram.
description: Australian singer Cody Simpson appears to be falling fast for Miley Cyrus.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
